SELECT id, app_id, name, type, match_value, is_exact_match, reply_type, reply_content, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by FROM t_wx_mp_msg_auto_reply
AND app_id LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{filter.appId} , '%' )
AND type LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{filter.type} , '%' )
AND name LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{filter.name} , '%' )
AND match_value LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{filter.matchValue} , '%' )
ORDER BY update_time DESC
